name: Dungeon Lurker (Gamedev Competition edition)
description:
Need help? See our walk throughs.

Dungeon Lurker is a game made for the 1st Zenva Phaser Gamedev Competitionbetween July 15th and July 29th.

UPDATE: We won 3rd Place!

The games must have 500KB in file size (phaser.js file not included) and the assets must be Free for Commercial use.

The games have the MIT License.
More info about Zenva's Competition HERE

Source code: https://github.com/CaioMGA/ZenvaGameJam
Reach me at: http://fb.com/caiomga

1. Click or touch the screen to move

2. Lure the enemies to hit each other

3. Reach the exit
